name: Crossing Carriages
description:
A game created in 72 hours for the Scorespace #10 Game Jam (Theme: Direction).

Your train is driving along, when suddenly disaster strikes! Your carriages are running out of fuel, and you need to guide them to the right pumps before it's too late!

Play a variety of minigames to discover the correct track to place each carriage on, and see how many levels you can go!

Instructions:

Click on a carriage to start that minigame. The instructions for that particular minigame will be at the bottom of the screen. Once you finish it, a prompt will tell you which of the three tracks, left, centre or right, to put it on (the starting track does not count). Get as many of your carriages on the right tracks by the time the timer runs out to take them to the next round. Survive as long as you can!

Tree Model by Google Poly (Google Poly)

Skybox by rpgwhitelock (Unity Asset Store)
